Title: Relates to assistance programs for individuals being released from correctional facilities
Summary: Provides assistance to incarcerated individuals being released from correctional facilities for enrollment in safety net assistance, public assistance, supplemental assistance program (SNAP), special supplemental nutrition program for women, infants and children (WIC), the home energy assistance program (HEAP), supplemental security income, and state supplemental payments.
LawCode: Amd ยง158, Soc Serv L; amd ยง112, add ยง500-q, Cor L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the correction law, in relation to assistance programs for individuals being released from correctional facilities
